The attached patch fixes an issue with fonts with single-byte encoding mode.

To confirm the issue run the included test case (bug.fo and fop.xconf supplied).

The current and post-fix output (ps and pdf) is also included.

text: The issue is for instance visible when using arial.ttf with encoding-mode="single-byte". Try to produce PostScript that outputs the smiley (☺) going the IF -> PS route, or inside SVG when going the FO -> PS route. The smiley glyph will be replaced by a box.
